# Core Location Functions

**API Collection**

The Core Location framework provides functions to help you work with coordinate values.

## Functions

- **CLLocationCoordinate2DMake(_:_:)**: Formats a latitude and longitude value into a coordinate data structure format.

## Reference

- **Core Location Constants**: This document describes the constants found in the Core Location framework.
